sections.title: About The Project
sections.description: Medicare is a healthcare app that connects patients with doctors for online consultations, appointments, and medical records.

sections.title: Feature
sections.description: Features include telemedicine, e-prescriptions, doctor chat, appointment scheduling, and health reminders.

sections.title: Stack
sections.description: Built using React Native for mobile, React.js for web, Node.js for backend, and MongoDB as database.

sections.title: About The Project
sections.description: EduTrack is an LMS (Learning Management System) platform developed to help institutions track student learning progress and deliver online courses.

sections.title: Feature
sections.description: Core features include course management, video lessons, quizzes, progress tracking, and discussion forums.

sections.title: Stack
sections.description: Developed using Laravel, Vue.js, PostgreSQL, and integrated with video streaming services.
